parse.title: The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings (Canada)

links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)

wikitext.*:
[[Image:The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings (Canada).jpg|thumb]]

This version of '''The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings''' (To Honor the Silver Anniversary) was published specifically for Canada by [[Methuen|Methuen Publications]]. It is illustrated by [[Paul Rivoche]] with images loosely based on the images from [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]].

* ISBN 458 946109
* Dimensions: 13 x 11.75 inches
* Stapled
* Punched hanging hole
* Glossy white, medium-weight paperboard sleeve
* Shrink-wrapped
